attributes.action: Ian Duncan Smith to live off £53 a week for a period of six months.
attributes.additional_details:
Ian Duncan Smith claimed on 1st April 2013 that he can live off £53 per week, so the undersigned demand that he tries.

This should be for a period of not less than six months, since a shorter time would not allow him the opportunity to experience sudden extra bills, repairs or replacements of furniture and clothes.
